prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with a rocky shell and large pincers.
Imagine a blue and yellow Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and has a tough exterior.
Design a bug-rock type Pokemon with striking red eyes and a fierce stance.
Show me a Pokemon that combines strength and agility, featuring a unique blend of colors.
Generate a creature that embodies both ancient power and modern design, perfect for adventurous trainers.
Make a Pokemon that has a rugged appearance with claws and armored plating, ideal for battles.
Give me a visually striking Pokemon that can adapt to various habitats from caves to mountains.
